summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ESP32 Fleet Manager - Full-stack application with JWT auth, device management, pin configuration, code editor, build system (mocked), OTA deployment, telemetry dashboard, RBAC, and audit logging. Backend APIs 96% successful, Frontend UI fully functional.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 400 when trying to register admin@test.com (expected - user already exists)

passed_tests: Backend: JWT Authentication (login, user info retrieval)
Backend: Device Management (create, list, get, claim, delete)
Backend: Pin Configuration (board profile, get/update config, validation)
Backend: Project Management (create, list, get, update, delete)
Backend: Build System MOCKED (trigger, list, get status with realistic delays)
Backend: Deployment System (create, list)
Backend: Telemetry Dashboard (fleet stats, device data)
Backend: Audit Logs (comprehensive activity tracking)
Backend: User Management (list users, role management)
Frontend: Authentication Flow (login with admin@test.com)
Frontend: Navigation (all 8 pages accessible)
Frontend: Dashboard (stats, charts, device table)
Frontend: Devices Page (create device dialog, device cards)
Frontend: Pin Configuration (ESP32-C3 chip visualization, pin assignment UI)
Frontend: Code Editor (Monaco editor, project creation)
Frontend: Build & Deploy (build/deploy sections, terminal output)
Frontend: OTA History (deployment management)
Frontend: Audit Log (activity history table)
Frontend: Settings (user management table, RBAC)
Integration: Backend-Frontend communication working properly
Integration: JWT token authentication flow
Integration: Real-time UI updates from backend APIs

success_percentage.backend: 96% (24/25 tests passed - only registration test failed due to existing user)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All pages accessible, UI components working, authentication flow working)
